text: "What's Next?" is a song by American alternative metal band Godsmack. The song was released on May 19, 2015. It is the latest single off the band's sixth studio album 1000hp.http://loudwire.com/godsmack-military-campaign-whats-next- single/?trackback=tsmclip ==Campaign With U.S. Military== During an appearance on Syracuse's K-ROCK radio station, frontman Sully Erna revealed plans for a military campaign that will accompany the song's release. "The best part of releasing the single is we're gonna do a whole campaign, because the lyrical content to the song is about the only thing that is certain is life and death, but what's next? So we're doing a whole campaign with the U.S. military." He then added clearly that they don't support war but they support troops and what they have to do.https://vimeo.com/127053233http://www.blabbermouth.net/news/godsmack-to- team-up-with-u-s-armed-forces-for-whats-next-single-campaign/ ==References== Category:2015 singles Category:2015 songs Category:Godsmack songs Category:Universal Republic Records singles Category:Songs written by Sully Erna
title: What's Next? (Godsmack song)
